---
title: "species_area_relationships"
output: html_notebook
---
```{r}
#load required packages

library(tidyverse)

#import datasets

sample_area <- read.csv("./data/species_sample_ref.csv")

species_matrix <- read.csv("./data/species_matrix.csv")

#create new columns to calculate species richness and total abundance of each sample

species_matrix$sp_rich <- rowSums(!is.na(species_matrix[,2:133]))

species_matrix$total_abundance <- rowSums(species_matrix[,2:133], na.rm = T)

#join species matrix with sample reference data

species_area <- full_join(sample_area, species_matrix, by = "SAMPLE_ID")

#select columns used in this analysis

species_area <- select(species_area, SAMPLE_ID, TOW_DIST_m, TOW_AREA_m2, sp_rich, total_abundance)


#plot results with biodiversity metrics on y axis and trawl distance/area on x axis

plot(total_abundance ~ TOW_AREA_m2, data = species_area, xlab = "Area Trawled (square meters)", ylab= "Total Abundance of All Species in Trawl")
plot(sp_rich ~ TOW_AREA_m2, data = species_area, xlab = "Area Trawled (square meters)", ylab = "Unique Species per Trawl")
plot(total_abundance ~ TOW_DIST_m, data = species_area, xlab = "Distance Trawled (meters)", ylab = "Total Abundance of All Species in Trawl")
plot(sp_rich ~ TOW_DIST_m, data = species_area, xlab = "Distance Trawled (meters)", ylab = "Unique Species per Trawl")
```
